definition: erhua variant of 炸土豆條|炸土豆条[zha2 tu3 dou4 tiao2]
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
